name: Transitional Housing Program (THP)
description: The Alternative Family Services (AFS) Lifelong Connections Project (LCP) empowers these Transition Age Youth (TAY) with the vital skills to recognize, nurture, and maintain enduring relationships crucial for a well-rounded and stable life. These enduring ties, referred to as their "Lifelong Connection," involve dedicated individuals or families who consistently present themselves in the TAY's life. Such connections are pivotal as TAY navigates challenges related to social integration, emotiona
